short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: InstantFlow Chrome Extension - Create automations on the n°1 social network to grow your business!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
💁‍♂️ Here is your new Insta chrome extension that will automatically fulfill your tasks, to find new prospects for your business. 

💥 The extension can add new people using a profile, hashtags, post url and your personal list nicknames.

👉 Create many different automations to grow your business.

⚙️ You can control the number of requests for each session, the time delay between each request randomly changes to look like human actions. 

💬 You can set all your messages templates in the settings section. We mix the messages templates with intros, bodies, and outro templates so the messages that you send are always different !

🚀 You can filter your contacts using tags. In the settings tab, you have a "tag" section which allows you to create and use tags when you launch a session, so all the new contacts will have this specific tag. You also can change the tags for each contact whenever you want !
